Come explore Nepal

Hands of Development tours take travellers from the bustling city of Kathmandu to the stunning mountain ranges and jungle of Chitwan National Park and the ancient city of Bhaktapur

Immersive tours to Nepal

You will further encounter a range of grassroots organisations empowering women, ending human trafficking and exploitation. Meet leaders and game changers working in diverse sectors including human rights law, education and community development. Learn firsthand what it takes to create real and lasting change in a developing country.

Hands On Development tours are perfect for those of any age or background curious to experience more of our beautiful world and gain a deeper insight into the culture and peoples of Nepal.
People leave the experience with memories of spectacular scenes of natural beauty, a profound understanding of Nepal across all levels of society and having witnessed first hand the work of charitable organisations creating real and lasting change.

So, join us to challenge your perspectives, form lasting friendships with like-minded individuals and experience a sense of joy, contribution, connection and growth on our next tour!

For more information and application forms, click here

 

Trek with Hands On Development

On our trekking tours, you will experience the beautiful Himalayas up close on our 7 day Gori Pani Trek. This will include a flight to Pokhara and stays in tea houses along the way. We employ local guides which will exceed your expectations and visits to landmarks and world heritage sites will come after the trek Read More

Cultural Immersion 10 day tour

 This tour will take you into the core of Nepali society where you will experience Nepal through its people. we will be visiting a number of different organizations and individuals who have created real and lasting change in their communities as well as visits to a local village, cooking classes, visits to fair trade factories. Participants leave with first hand knowledge across a range of different issues and elated after a life enriching trip of connection, self growth and contribution. 

Read More

Already have a trip planned to Nepal?

Visit us at our seven women centre- we would love to see you. 

You can book in for a number of classes we teach such as cooking class, basic Nepali for travelers and craft classes at our centre, please enquire below for more details.

Get in touch

Seven Women Supporters

Seven Women

Seven Women has socially and economically empowered over 5000 women in Nepal through literacy, skills training and income-generation programs. 

Feel free to send us an email at steph.w@seven-women.com
